channel.title: How to make items auto-keep on death?

item.title: How to make items auto-keep on death?
item.dc:creator: @P_o_s_t_m_a_n P o s t m a n
item.description:
@P_o_s_t_m_a_n wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:13, topic:370449”][quote author=P o s t m a n link=topic=466552.msg3412593#msg3412593 date=1290815160]

well, if you’re using delta then start with searching for 6570 in client.java since that is the item id of fire cape. then c+p that chunk of code for the next item u want to keep, it should be there more than once,

once that is done repeat the procedure in player.java

Not using delta.
[/quote]

so then are you using pi?

if so then thats really easy to do[/quote]

No, just normal 317 with a 424 interface.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make items auto-keep on death?
